about_the_game:
Castillo: The Nine Circles is a retro FPS Collectathon mixing the exploration from 90’s platformers with all the carnage you love from the best 90’s shooters. Collect power shards hidden in each circle of hell to unlock new areas in the hub and open 9 diverse worlds.

Your killer has traveled back in time to torture your past self, even if he must rip apart time to keep you there.



  • Unlock unique abilities to make it easier to traverse each world.
  • Destroy a wide cast of monsters with an arsenal of deadly weapons.
  • Build up large combos for a speed boost.



  • Immerse yourself in the 9 circles of hell, each inspired by Dante’s Inferno and teeming with secrets.
  • Meet an unforgettable cast of characters along with a horde of shiny collectables.

This demo contains the first 3 worlds of the game to explore along with the first section of the hub world.

Your killer has traveled back in time to torture your past self, even if he must rip apart time to keep you there.

name: CASTILLO - THE NINE CIRCLES Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Later
  • Processor: AMD Phenom X3 8750 2.4 GHz
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Vega 3 or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Later
  • Processor: 2.4 GHZ Quad Core Processor
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: CASTILLO: The Nine Circles is an FPS Collectathon. Collect power shards in each circle of hell to unlock new areas and progress on your quest through 9 diverse worlds. Embark on a journey through the circles of Hell, using unique abilities and weapons.
